import { Formik, Form } from 'formik'; import RegisterInput from '../../components/inputs/registerInput'; import {useState} from 'react'; const userInfos = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", password: "", bYear:"", bMonth:"", bDay:"", gender:"", }; export default function RegisterForm() { const[user, setUser]=useState(userInfos); const handleRegisterChange = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value, }) } return (
Sign Up It's quick and easy
{ (formik) => (
Date of Birth
Gender
) }
) }
